info.description:
Provides access to the complete features provided by Alfresco Process Services powered by Activiti.

You can use this API to integrate Alfresco Process Services with external applications.
info.title: Process Services Enterprise API

tags.name: integration-alfresco-cloud
tags.description: Manage Alfresco Cloud sites and networks

tags.description: Retrieve and manage runtime app deployments

get.description: Accounts are used to integrate with third party apps and clients

delete.summary: Remove a capability from a group

post.summary: Add a user to a group

delete.summary: Delete a member from a group

get.description: Only a tenant manager may access this endpoint

post.description: Only a tenant manager may access this endpoint

put.summary: Bulk update a list of users

post.description:
Allows a zip file to be uploaded containing an app definition and any number of included models.

This is useful to bootstrap an environment (for users or continuous integration).

Before using any processes included in the import the app must be published and deployed.

parameters.name: renewIdmEntries
parameters.description: Whether to renew user and group identifiers

get.description: This will return a zip file containing the app definition model and all related models (process definitions and forms).

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: modelId from a runtime app or the id of an app definition model

500.description:
Could not deserialize app definition
or
Model contains validation errors, please fix the issues in the editor
or
Could not generate app definition zip archive

403.description: User has no sufficient capabilities or permissions

post.summary: Update the content of an existing app
post.description:
Imports an app inside an existing app definition and creates a new version

Before using any new or updated processes included in the import the app must be (re-)published and deployed.

Publishing an app definition makes it available for use. The application must not have any validation errors or an error will be returned.

Before an app definition can be used by other users, it must also be deployed for their use

get.description: Provides information about the running Alfresco Process Services Suite. The response payload object has the properties `type`, `majorVersion`, `minorVersion`, `revisionVersion` and `edition`.

post.description: The request body provided must define either a valid filterId value or filter object

delete.summary: Cancel or remove a process instance
delete.description: If the process instance has not yet been completed, it will be cancelled. If it has already finished or been cancelled then the process instance will be removed and will no longer appear in queries.

403.description: If the user does not have permission to cancel or remove the process instance

404.description: If the process instance does not exist

get.description: This operation returns account information for the current user. This is useful to get the name, email, the groups that the user is part of, the user picture, etc.

post.description: Only a first name, last name, email and company can be updated

get.description: Generally returns an image file
A tenant administrator can configure one or more Alfresco repositories to use when working with content.

get.summary: List files and folders inside a specific folder identified by folder path

get.description: When a user logs in into Alfresco Process Services Suite, a landing page is displayed containing all the apps that the user is allowed to see and use. These are referred to as runtime apps.

post.description: Deploying an app allows the user to see it on his/her landing page. Apps must be published before they can be deployed.

get.summary: Get an app by deployment ID or DMN deployment ID
get.description: Either a deploymentId or a dmnDeploymentId must be provided
Typical value is AllowInvolveByEmail

get.summary: Get involved users who can edit forms

get.description: Form field values that are populated through a REST backend, can be retrieved via this service
Specific case to retrieve information on a specific column

get.summary: Get the submitted form for a task
